== Bailur (603818) ==
      
Bailur is a village in the [[Bhatkal ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 892.71 hectares and harbouring 1302 households with total population of 6029 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[BHATKAL]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 2983 and female population is 3046. Scheduled Caste Population is 321 and Scheduled Tribes population is 15. Census Location Code of the village is 603818<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
